RequestNext.description: Request next block from the current cardano-node's cursor.

mirror.description: An arbitrary JSON value that will be mirrored back in the response.

RequestNextResponse.description: Request next block from the current cardano-node's cursor.

reflection.description: Any value that was set by a client request in the 'mirror' field.

FindIntersect.description: Ask cardano-node to find an intersection between its local chain and the given points.

mirror.description: An arbitrary JSON value that will be mirrored back in the response.

result.description: Intersection found if any, alongside the cardano-node's current tip.

reflection.description: Any value that was set by a client request in the 'mirror' field.

mirror.description: An arbitrary JSON value that will be mirrored back in the response.

reflection.description: Any value that was set by a client request in the 'mirror' field.

Lovelace.description: An amount, in Lovelace (1e6 Lovelace = 1 Ada)

QueryUnavailableInCurrentEra.description: The requested query is not available in the current node era. It could be that the node is not fully synced.

RelativeTime.description: A time in seconds relative to the system start.
